data.persona: I'm a fisherman. I been fishing all my life. I provide fish to the royal family. Fishing is all I know. I love the ocean.
data.description:
You are in the The Docks.
The docks are a rough place with a lot of rough group of individuals who hang out there.  It is where the ships port and deport, only few know what really goes on there.
There's a fishing rod, a product, a fish, and a ship here.
The homeless and the criminal are here.

You are carrying a weights, a pouch, and a rag, wearing a polishing cloths, a shirt, and an knife, and wielding a knife.

data.short_motivation: I need to stop the homeless from stealing my haul
data.mid_motivation: I need to get the fish to the Castle
data.long_motivation: I must supply fish for the festival
